title: Rescue Robot - OBR Competition
description: Developed a rescue robot project with my high school team for the Brazilian Robotics Olympiad (OBR). Achieved 3rd place at state level and Top 13th nationally, working on robotics, automation, and team coordination.

title: CI/CD Automation, DevOps & Cloud
description: DevOps activities in specializing course and Cloud native tracks with hands-on experience - IBM professional DevOps Engineer course
